verses.text_ar: صٓ ۚ وَٱلْقُرْءَانِ ذِى ٱلذِّكْرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Sad. By the renowned Qur´an,

verses.text_ar: بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ فِى عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Nay, but those who disbelieve are in false pride and schism.

verses.text_ar: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَبْلِهِم مِّن قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوا۟ وَّلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: How many a generation We destroyed before them, and they cried out when it was no longer the time for escape!

verses.text_ar: وَعَجِبُوٓا۟ أَن جَآءَهُم مُّنذِرٌ مِّنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ هَـٰذَا سَـٰحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they marvel that a warner from among themselves hath come unto them, and the disbelievers say: This is a wizard, a charlatan.

verses.text_ar: أَجَعَلَ ٱلْـَٔالِهَةَ إِلَـٰهًا وَٰحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ عُجَابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Maketh he the gods One Allah? Lo! that is an astounding thing.

verses.text_ar: وَٱنطَلَقَ ٱلْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ ٱمْشُوا۟ وَٱصْبِرُوا۟ عَلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَشَىْءٌ يُرَادُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The chiefs among them go about, exhorting: Go and be staunch to your gods! Lo! this is a thing designed.

verses.text_ar: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِى ٱلْمِلَّةِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخْتِلَـٰقٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We have not heard of this in later religion. This is naught but an invention.

verses.text_ar: أَءُنزِلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ مِنۢ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِى شَكٍّ مِّن ذِكْرِى ۖ بَل لَّمَّا يَذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hath the reminder been unto him (alone) among us? Nay, but they are in doubt concerning My reminder; nay but they have not yet tasted My doom.

verses.text_ar: أَمْ عِندَهُمْ خَزَآئِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْوَهَّابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Or are theirs the treasures of the mercy of thy Lord, the Mighty, the Bestower?

verses.text_ar: أَمْ لَهُم مُّلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَسْبَـٰبِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Or is the kingdom of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them theirs? Then let them ascend by ropes!

verses.text_ar: جُندٌ مَّا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِّنَ ٱلْأَحْزَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: A defeated host are (all) the factions that are there.

verses.text_ar: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو ٱلْأَوْتَادِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The folk of Noah before them denied (their messenger) and (so did the tribe of) A´ad, and Pharaoh firmly planted,

verses.text_ar: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَـٰبُ لْـَٔيْكَةِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلْأَحْزَابُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And (the tribe of) Thamud, and the folk of Lot, and the dwellers in the wood: these were the factions.

verses.text_ar: إِن كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ ٱلرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Not one of them but did deny the messengers, therefor My doom was justified,

verses.text_ar: وَمَا يَنظُرُ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَٰحِدَةً مَّا لَهَا مِن فَوَاقٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: These wait for but one Shout, there will be no second thereto.

verses.text_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا عَجِّل لَّنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They say: Our Lord! Hasten on for us our fate before the Day of Reckoning.

verses.text_ar: ٱصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُۥدَ ذَا ٱلْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Bear with what they say, and remember Our bondman David, lord of might, Lo! he was ever turning in repentance (toward Allah).

verses.text_ar: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا ٱلْجِبَالَ مَعَهُۥ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِشْرَاقِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We subdued the hills to hymn the praises (of their Lord) with him at nightfall and sunrise,

verses.text_ar: وَٱلطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the birds assembled; all were turning unto Him.

verses.text_ar: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُۥ وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ ٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: We made his kingdom strong and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.

verses.text_ar: ۞ وَهَلْ أَتَىٰكَ نَبَؤُا۟ ٱلْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا۟ ٱلْمِحْرَابَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And hath the story of the litigants come unto thee? How they climbed the wall into the royal chamber;

verses.text_ar: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ دَاوُۥدَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَٱهْدِنَآ إِلَىٰ سَوَآءِ ٱلصِّرَٰطِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: How they burst in upon David, and he was afraid of them. They said: Be not afraid! (We are) two litigants, one of whom hath wronged the other, therefor judge aright between us; be not unjust; and show us the fair way.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰذَآ أَخِى لَهُۥ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِىَ نَعْجَةٌ وَٰحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِى فِى ٱلْخِطَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! this my brother hath ninety and nine ewes while I had one ewe; and he said: Entrust it to me, and he conquered me in speech.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِۦ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِّنَ ٱلْخُلَطَآءِ لَيَبْغِى بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَّا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُۥدُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّـٰهُ فَٱسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُۥ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
verses.text_en_pickthall: (David) said: He hath wronged thee in demanding thine ewe in addition to his ewes, and lo! many partners oppress one another, save such as believe and do good works, and they are few. And David guessed that We had tried him, and he sought forgiveness of his Lord, and he bowed himself and fell down prostrate and repented.

verses.text_ar: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُۥ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So We forgave him that; and lo! he had access to Our presence and a happy journey´s end.

verses.text_ar: يَـٰدَاوُۥدُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَـٰكَ خَلِيفَةً فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ فَٱحْكُم بَيْنَ ٱلنَّاسِ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ ٱلْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌۢ بِمَا نَسُوا۟ يَوْمَ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it was said unto him): O David! Lo! We have set thee as a viceroy in the earth; therefor judge aright between mankind, and follow not desire that it beguile thee from the way of Allah. Lo! those who wander from the way of Allah have an awful doom, forasmuch as they forgot the Day of Reckoning.

verses.text_ar: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَآءَ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَـٰطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We created not the heaven and the earth and all that is between them in vain. That is the opinion of those who disbelieve. And woe unto those who disbelieve, from the Fire!

verses.text_ar: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ كَٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ كَٱلْفُجَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Shall We treat those who believe and do good works as those who spread corruption in the earth; or shall We treat the pious as the wicked?

verses.text_ar: كِتَـٰبٌ أَنزَلْنَـٰهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَـٰرَكٌ لِّيَدَّبَّرُوٓا۟ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (This is) a Scripture that We have revealed unto thee, full of blessing, that they may ponder its revelations, and that men of understanding may reflect.

verses.text_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُۥدَ سُلَيْمَـٰنَ ۚ نِعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We bestowed on David, Solomon. How excellent a slave! Lo! he was ever turning in repentance (toward Allah).

verses.text_ar: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ ٱلصَّـٰفِنَـٰتُ ٱلْجِيَادُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When there were shown to him at eventide lightfooted coursers

verses.text_ar: فَقَالَ إِنِّىٓ أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ ٱلْخَيْرِ عَن ذِكْرِ رَبِّى حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِٱلْحِجَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And he said: Lo! I have preferred the good things (of the world) to the remembrance of my Lord; till they were taken out of sight behind the curtain.

verses.text_ar: رُدُّوهَا عَلَىَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًۢا بِٱلسُّوقِ وَٱلْأَعْنَاقِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Then he said): Bring them back to me, and fell to slashing (with his sword their) legs and necks.

verses.text_ar: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَـٰنَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِۦ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And verily We tried Solomon, and set upon his throne a (mere) body. Then did he repent.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱغْفِرْ لِى وَهَبْ لِى مُلْكًا لَّا يَنۢبَغِى لِأَحَدٍ مِّنۢ بَعْدِىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْوَهَّابُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: My Lord! Forgive me and bestow on me sovereignty such as shall not belong to any after me. Lo! Thou art the Bestower.

verses.text_ar: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ ٱلرِّيحَ تَجْرِى بِأَمْرِهِۦ رُخَآءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: So We made the wind subservient unto him, setting fair by his command whithersoever he intended.

verses.text_ar: وَٱلشَّيَـٰطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّآءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And the unruly, every builder and diver (made We subservient),

verses.text_ar: وَءَاخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِى ٱلْأَصْفَادِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And others linked together in chains,

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا عَطَآؤُنَا فَٱمْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (Saying): This is Our gift, so bestow thou, or withhold, without reckoning.

verses.text_ar: وَإِنَّ لَهُۥ عِندَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lo! he hath favour with Us, and a happy journey´s end.

verses.text_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَآ أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥٓ أَنِّى مَسَّنِىَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And make mention (O Muhammad) of Our bondman Job, when he cried unto his Lord (saying): Lo! the devil doth afflict me with distress and torment.

verses.text_ar: ٱرْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَـٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌۢ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: (And it was said unto him): Strike the ground with thy foot. This (spring) is a cool bath and a refreshing drink.

verses.text_ar: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُۥٓ أَهْلَهُۥ وَمِثْلَهُم مَّعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِّنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَلْبَـٰبِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And We bestowed on him (again) his household and therewith the like thereof, a mercy from Us, and a memorial for men of understanding.

verses.text_ar: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَٱضْرِب بِّهِۦ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَـٰهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِّعْمَ ٱلْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَوَّابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And (it was said unto him): Take in thine hand a branch and smite therewith, and break not thine oath. Lo! We found him steadfast, how excellent a slave! Lo! he was ever turning in repentance (to his Lord).

verses.text_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ عِبَـٰدَنَآ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسْحَـٰقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُو۟لِى ٱلْأَيْدِى وَٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And make mention of Our bondmen, Abraham, Isaac and Jacob, men of parts and vision.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّآ أَخْلَصْنَـٰهُم بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى ٱلدَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! We purified them with a pure thought, remembrance of the Home (of the Hereafter).

verses.text_ar: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِندَنَا لَمِنَ ٱلْمُصْطَفَيْنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! in Our sight they are verily of the elect, the excellent.

verses.text_ar: وَٱذْكُرْ إِسْمَـٰعِيلَ وَٱلْيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِّنَ ٱلْأَخْيَارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And make mention of Ishmael and Elisha and Dhu´l-Kifl. All are of the chosen.

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This is a reminder. And lo! for those who ward off (evil) is a happy journey´s end,

verses.text_ar: جَنَّـٰتِ عَدْنٍ مُّفَتَّحَةً لَّهُمُ ٱلْأَبْوَٰبُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Gardens of Eden, whereof the gates are opened for them,

verses.text_ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَـٰكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Wherein, reclining, they call for plenteous fruit and cool drink (that is) therein.

verses.text_ar: ۞ وَعِندَهُمْ قَـٰصِرَٰتُ ٱلطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And with them are those of modest gaze, companions.

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ ٱلْحِسَابِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This it is that ye are promised for the Day of Reckoning.

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُۥ مِن نَّفَادٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! this in truth is Our provision, which will never waste away.

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّـٰغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَـَٔابٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: This (is for the righteous). And lo! for the transgressors there with be an evil journey´s end,

verses.text_ar: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Hell, where they will burn, an evil resting-place.

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Here is a boiling and an ice-cold draught, so let them taste it,

verses.text_ar: وَءَاخَرُ مِن شَكْلِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And other (torment) of the kind in pairs (the two extremes)!

verses.text_ar: هَـٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُّقْتَحِمٌ مَّعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُوا۟ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Here is an army rushing blindly with you. (Those who are already in the Fire say): No word of welcome for them. Lo! they will roast at the Fire.

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ أَنتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًۢا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ ٱلْقَرَارُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They say: Nay, but you (misleaders), for you there is no word of welcome. Ye prepared this for us (by your misleading). Now hapless is the plight.

verses.text_ar: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَـٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: They say: Our Lord! Whoever did prepare this for us, oh, give him double portion of the Fire!

verses.text_ar: وَقَالُوا۟ مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُم مِّنَ ٱلْأَشْرَارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And they say: What aileth us that we behold not men whom we were wont to count among the wicked?

verses.text_ar: أَتَّخَذْنَـٰهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Did we take them (wrongly) for a laughing-stock, or have our eyes missed them?

verses.text_ar: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ ٱلنَّارِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! that is very truth: the wrangling of the dwellers in the Fire.

verses.text_ar: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ مُنذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ٱلْوَٰحِدُ ٱلْقَهَّارُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Say (unto them, O Muhammad): I am only a warner, and there is no Allah save Allah, the One, the Absolute,

verses.text_ar: رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْغَفَّـٰرُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, the Mighty, the Pardoning.

verses.text_ar: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَؤٌا۟ عَظِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Say: It is tremendous tidings

verses.text_ar: أَنتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Whence ye turn away!

verses.text_ar: مَا كَانَ لِىَ مِنْ عِلْمٍۭ بِٱلْمَلَإِ ٱلْأَعْلَىٰٓ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: I had no knowledge of the Highest Chiefs when they disputed;

verses.text_ar: إِن يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَىَّ إِلَّآ أَنَّمَآ أَنَا۠ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: It is revealed unto me only that I may be a plain warner.

verses.text_ar: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن طِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: When thy Lord said unto the angels: Lo! I am about to create a mortal out of mire,

verses.text_ar: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And when I have fashioned him and breathed into him of My Spirit, then fall down before him prostrate,

verses.text_ar: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: The angels fell down prostrate, every one,

verses.text_ar: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ ٱسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Saving Iblis; he was scornful and became one of the disbelievers.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَن تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَىَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلْعَالِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: O Iblis! What hindereth thee from falling prostrate before that which I have created with both My hands? Art thou too proud or art thou of the high exalted?

verses.text_ar: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِى مِن نَّارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن طِينٍ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: I am better than him. Thou createdst me of fire, whilst him Thou didst create of clay.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: Go forth from hence, for lo! thou art outcast,

verses.text_ar: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And lo! My curse is on thee till the Day of Judgment.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: My Lord! Reprieve me till the day when they are raised.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: Lo! thou art of those reprieved

verses.text_ar: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Until the day of the time appointed.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: Then, by Thy might, I surely will beguile them every one,

verses.text_ar: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Save Thy single-minded slaves among them.

verses.text_ar: قَالَ فَٱلْحَقُّ وَٱلْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
verses.text_en_pickthall: He said: The Truth is, and the Truth I speak,

verses.text_ar: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنكَ وَمِمَّن تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: That I shall fill hell with thee and with such of them as follow thee, together.

verses.text_ar: قُلْ مَآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَآ أَنَا۠ مِنَ ٱلْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Say (O Muhammad, unto mankind): I ask of you no fee for this, and I am no simulating.

verses.text_ar: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.text_en_pickthall: Lo! it is naught else than a reminder for all peoples

verses.text_ar: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُۥ بَعْدَ حِينٍۭ
verses.text_en_pickthall: And ye will come in time to know the truth thereof.
